snippet: An editorial delivered Tuesday on Syrian state television accused Khaled Meshal, the leader of the Palestinian militant group Hamas, of having a “romantic emotional crisis” over the Syrian uprising.
lead_paragraph: An editorial delivered Tuesday on Syrian state television accused Khaled Meshal, the leader of the Palestinian militant group Hamas, of having a “romantic emotional crisis” over the Syrian uprising.

headline.main: Transcript of Editorial on Syrian State TV
headline.print_headline: Transcript of Editorial on Syrian State TV
